SummaryEnglish: This spinoff of Detective Conan centers on the daily life of the "threefaced" operative, known as Rei Furuya to the National Police Agency, Tōru Amuro as a private detective and Café Poirot waiter, and Bourbon as a member of the Black Organization.
Aliases: Detective Conan Zero no Tea Time
Meitantei Conan: Zero no Tea Time

1.SummaryEnglish: As Toru Amuro, Rei Furuya starts his day bright and early to open up Café Poirot, the bustling coffee shop located under the Mouri detective agency.

2.SummaryEnglish: While working at Poirot, Rei has to duck out to chase down a fugitive. During his intense daily workout, Rei comes across an adorable little dog.

3.SummaryEnglish: After an eventful night, Rei goes undercover to a popular curry shop and meets up with Kazami, who bravely orders the spiciest curry on the menu.

4.SummaryEnglish: While chasing a thief, Rei unknowingly participates in an obstacle course game show. Later, as he teaches a boy to ride a bike, a memory surfaces.

5.SummaryEnglish: After a brief encounter with an FBI agent, Rei washes his beloved car and discovers an adorable little dog that's determined to win his heart.

6.SummaryEnglish: Rei doesn’t know what to call his furry friend yet — but discovers that the dog loves his guitar playing, which inspires the perfect name.
